answers.answer: Idena provides Proof-of-Personhood stamp for Gitcoin Passport
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer: Idena is a privacy-preserving Proof-of-Personhood (PoP) protocol designed to prevent Sybil attacks, particularly through human-based account farming.
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer: Idena addresses key challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem, particularly Sybil attacks and centralization risks, by introducing a Proof-of-Personhood protocol. Idenaâ€™s sublinear identity staking ensures that users with smaller stakes receive higher rewards, promoting decentralization and preventing the dominance of wealthy participants. Unlike many identity-based solutions, Idena preserves user privacy by verifying identities without exposing personal data. This combination of PoP and privacy protection offers a more decentralized and user-friendly alternative to existing identity solutions.
answers.question: What specific problems or challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem does your project address? How does your solution improve upon existing alternatives?

answers.answer: The grant funds will be allocated to support the project's core development goals. This includes maintaining network stability, fixing bugs to ensure smooth operation, and improving overall system performance. If sufficient funds are available, part of the grant will be directed towards AI development to create advanced tools that generate AI-resistant flips, enhancing the security and resilience of the network's human verification process. These efforts will ensure long-term network sustainability and Idenaâ€™s adoption.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer:
Sub-linear identity staking promotes decentralization by offering higher returns to identities with smaller stakes, encouraging broader participation and preventing wealth concentration from dominating the network.
Check out Vitalikâ€™s tweet on IdenaðŸ‘‡
https://x.com/VitalikButerin/status/1828730602721341833
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the decentralization and security of the Ethereum network?

answers.answer: Idena is a separate non-evm based blockchain based on the network of PoP validators
answers.question: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: IDENA
project.description:
Idena is a Proof-Of-Person protocol employing a 'one-person-one-vote' consensus algorithm for its network. Prioritizing people over tokens, Idena ensures that voting power is distributed equally among all participants, thus preventing a small group from gaining excessive control

Idena offers a puppet-resistant 'cryptoidentity' primitive, utilized for democratic voting, quadratic funding, airdrops, and decentralized governance. Idena serves as one of the Gitcoin Passport stamp providers

The Idena's Proof-Of-Personhood protocol is accessible to anyone and does not require any personal information. Users actively engage in mutual verification by challenging each other with AI-resistant, user-generated FLIP tests. This process is done in a synchronous ceremony, which ensures that individuals cannot spoof multiple accounts.

The network is protected from Sybil attacks through regular validations and [Sublinear Staking](https://www.idena.io/staking). Sublinear Staking economy prevents large stake holders from dominating the network and encourages small individuals to secure their identities with stakes ensuring democratic staking rewards distribution.

![sublinear-staking](https://github.com/idena-network/idena-go/assets/47352542/c8dd7b6e-d8e8-48c0-a08f-e4bc4a716162)
